snippet: A former avionics technician who authorities said had wanted to cause “maximum carnage” admitted Monday to plotting a suicide bomb attack at a Wichita airport.
abstract: Former avionics technician Terry L Loewen pleads guilty to plotting suicide bomb attack at Wichita, Kan, airport; strikes deal with prosecutors for 20-year sentence.
lead_paragraph: A former avionics technician who authorities said had wanted to cause “maximum carnage” admitted Monday to plotting a suicide bomb attack at a Wichita airport.

headline.main: Kansas: Man Pleads Guilty in Plot to Bomb Airport
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Man Pleads Guilty in Plot to Bomb Airport
